snippet: The large Swiss bank's fourth-quarter earnings fell to 393 million Swiss francs, or $427 million, as gains at UBS's wealth management unit failed to make up for the investment banking loss.
abstract: The large Swiss bank's fourth-quarter earnings fell to 393 million Swiss francs, or $427 million, as gains at UBS's wealth management unit failed to make up for the investment banking loss.

headline.main: UBS Profit Falls 76% on Loss in Investment Banking
